sentences: Navene Koperweis (born May 31, 1985) is an American drummer, multi-instrumentalist, composer, and producer, best known as the former drummer of Animosity, Hoods and Animals as Leaders.
He currently plays for Entheos, and serves as session drummer for Machine Head.
Koperweis started drumming when he was eleven years old.
He is also a dubstep/electronica producer, and is currently working on his debut electronic album.
